task.title: Add a key visitor
task.shortdesc: Steps that describe how to add a key visitor.

step.cmd: In version 14, click Admin > Report Suites.
Click Edit Settings > Traffic > Key Visitors.
In the Add Key Visitor field, specify the Key Visitor to track by IP address or domain name.

stepresult.p: For example, if you want to track visitors from ABC Corp., you could specify either abccorp.com or the associated ABC Corp. IP address (for example, 100.211.2.15).

step.cmd: Click Add to save the entry.

stepresult.p: Once added, you can click Delete to delete a key visitor entry. You can also click the Report Suites link to see all reports suites that track this particular key visitor.
